document.full_text: president barack obama and his wife michelle will appear together on "the oprah winfrey show" in may, as the tv chat show queen nears the end of her 25-year reign.
document.title: obamas return to oprah, as tv chat show winds down
lines_and_colors: president barack obama and his wife michelle will appear together on "the oprah winfrey show" in may, as the tv chat show queen nears the end of her 25-year reign.
